column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I regret that we did not meet your standards for food or service
column2: but I feel it is very necessary to clarify a few of the points you made in your review. I respect and understand your feelings towards our establishment
column3: but I would still like to invite you to come back and give us another chance
column4: however unlikely that might be. And if you decide to return
column5: please ask for me or any of my managers (Keith
column8: who will make sure everything is done to offer you a vastly superior dining experience.
